New publication out in Metallomics!

Hi all,

I just recently published a review article with Kathy Barbeau (my primary adviser) and Martha Gledhill about the biogeochemistry of heme in marine systems. Unfortunately, the paper is not in an open access journal. If you don't have access and want to read it, message me for a copy.

Best,

S
